decks.notes: This Dimir Aggro deck focuses on early aggression and tempo disruption. By utilizing cards like Faerie Mastermind and Spyglass Siren, the deck aims to control the board while chipping away at the opponent's life total. Ertai Resurrected and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse provide powerful late-game threats, while Cut Down and Go for the Throat handle opposing creatures. With a mix of evasive creatures and removal spells, this deck can quickly overwhelm opponents and secure victories through a combination of damage and control.

This Bant Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming opponents with a combination of low-cost creatures and powerful spells. The deck utilizes cards like Venerated Rotpriest and Crawling Chorus for early game pressure, while also having control elements such as Serum Snare and Fading Hope to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck also includes powerful finishers like Mirrex and Bloated Contaminator to quickly close out games. By combining aggressive creatures with control elements, this deck aims to maintain a strong board presence while disrupting the opponent's game plan.

This deck focuses on disrupting your opponent's strategy by controlling the board and countering their spells. It utilizes a combination of removal spells, counterspells, and card draw to control the pace of the game. The creatures included in the deck are primarily there to provide additional value or disruption. The land base is designed to support the control aspect of the deck, with a mix of colored mana sources and utility lands. Overall, the goal is to outlast and outmaneuver your opponent until you can secure a victory.

This deck focuses on utilizing a combination of control cards and powerful creatures like Archangel of Wrath and Atraxa, Grand Unifier to dominate the battlefield. With cards like Leyline Binding and Topiary Stomper, the deck aims to disrupt opponents' strategies while building up its own. By utilizing cards like Jetmir's Garden and Sunfall, the deck can generate additional resources and maintain board presence. Overall, the deck aims to control the game through a combination of removal, disruption, and powerful creatures to secure victory.

The main concept of this deck is to establish control over the opponent by utilizing a combination of creatures with powerful abilities, like Topiary Stomper and Archangel of Wrath, along with support spells like Leyline Binding and Up the Beanstalk. Atraxa, Grand Unifier helps to further solidify control over the board, while cards like Sunfall and Invasion of Zendikar provide additional value. The mana base is designed to support casting the diverse range of spells efficiently, with strategic land choices like Cavern of Souls and Boseiju, Who Endures.Overall, the deck focuses on maintaining dominance and outlasting the opponent through strategic control.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and powerful removal spells. The key strategy is to quickly establish a board presence with efficient creatures like Preacher of the Schism and Archfiend of the Dross, supported by disruption spells like Go for the Throat and Gix's Command. The deck also includes high-impact cards like Ob Nixilis, the Adversary and Liliana of the Veil to control the game and finish off the opponent. With a mix of aggro threats and versatile removal, this deck aims to pressure the opponent and secure a quick victory.
